page.title: 09PEOPLE OF LITTLE BARFORD.
page.content: We asked can we go to the church by the road.Mrs Morris said we can go through her garden. When we came to the church we wrote some of people who had died in{Little Barford.}Also of the people who died fighting in the first world war.These are a list of names; H Alington, G W Brace, A V Brace, F W Brace , F H Brown.T A Royds and W L J Sawyer.Then we had a look at some other graves these are most of the names on the graves Mary Brace, Joseph Brace, Samuel Peacock, Henry Gray, Mary Gray, Annie Peacock and Maria Reid.The church had been closed for five or six years.After looking at the church we had our break.By the road there were some cows and their calves.When we came back from the church we saw Mrs Morris again.
